game.name: Space Station: Beyond
game.genres: 액션, 인디, 대규모 멀티플레이어, RPG, 시뮬레이션, 무료 플레이
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, MMO, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, 크로스 플랫폼 멀티플레이어, 텍스트 크기 조절, 음량 개별 조정, 스테레오 사운드, Steam Cloud
game.shortDescription: Play as a variety of creatures or characters and try to survive either maintaining or attacking a space station while everything that can go wrong has already gone wrong.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Play as a variety of creatures or characters and try to survive either maintaining or attacking a space station while everything that can go wrong has already gone wrong.
